EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now: Rotation Provider product demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Product Demonstration
Last Chance to Register! VisiCAD Rotation Provider
Join Customer Account Managers Ken Schulte and Sally Olson-Nelson and Product Specialist James Howard for a Product Demonstration of VisiCAD's Rotation Provider. In this upcoming webinar, discover the benefits and functionality of the Rotation Provider module to take out the complexity of managing rotation providers.
Webinar: Wednesday, August 25 10 am PT l 12 noon CT l 1 pm ET
*If you cannot view the "Register Now" button above, please copy and paste the URL into any internet browser to Register: http://tritech.ilinc.com/register/mymmwbb
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
